runs.comm: bowls it full outside off, almost yorker length, digs it out into the leg side for a single
short of a good length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
shortish on leg stump, turned away towards midwicket, dot ball
plays it forcefully towards extra cover
short of a good length on leg stump, punched towards midwicket
excellent start by Deonarine, pushed it full and quick outside off, chips it towards extra cover, lands on the bounce
angling it towards leg stump, Watson tries to push it past midwicket, is struck on the pads but it would have been sliding down
cracked straight to point
slog-sweep, an attempted slog-sweep, tries to smash it over midwicket, gets an inside edge onto the pads, the frustration builds
sliding on the pads, clipped wide of short fine for a single
Warner gets hold of one, slightly overpitched, made room and lofted it over extra cover for a couple of bounces over the ropes
bowls it on a good length on the off, punched towards mid-off
short of a good length outside off, chops it towards point
shortish on the off, drags it in ugly fashion past the bowler into the deep towards long-on for a single
short of a good length on the off, a tight line, punched just wide of mid-off, no run on offer there
slower one bowled on a good length outside off, takes the aerial route, clears cover and point for a one bounce four
lands it on a length on the off, driven straight towards mid-off
edged and four, good length and he makes room to crash that through the covers, gets a thick edge past the keeper to the third-man boundary
bowls it full on middle, driven hard back to the bowler who fumbles to allow them a single
gives him the charge, takes it off a length and lofts him cleanly over mid-off for a boundary, back on track after that quietish start
that's disappeared, out of the ground and into the street, pitched up, in the slot for Warner, took a couple of steps forward and launched it handsomely over deep midwicket
pitched it up on leg stump, driven hard but straight to mid-on
full toss on middle, came down the track and swatted it over the bowler's head for another boundary, beat the diving fielder in the deep
pushed off the front foot wide of mid-off for a single to keep the strike
bowls it on a length on middle, driven with a full face towards mid-off
lucky, slower one bowled short on middle, the offcutter, tries to smack him over midwicket, gets the top edge but it lands safely in front of mid-on
pushed down the ground towards mid-on for a single
low full toss on leg stump, driven down the ground towards long-on for one more
Watson gets into the act now, this is a strong start, bowled on a length and he is onto it quickly, picks it up beautifully, dispatching it into the stands over deep midwicket for a massive six
four more, pushed it full and he sliced it into that gap between point and short third man for another boundary
short on middle, goes for the pull, misses, good bounce and good pace
what a comeback from Warner, it was six the moment he hit it, sweet sound of bat murdering the ball, short of a length and he pulls it with utter disdain over deep square leg into the stands
slower one bowled short outside off, chops it in front of the keeper for a single
short of a length outside off, guided to third man for a single
four more, short of a length outside off, makes room, slashes hard and gets it over short third man for another boundary
didn't pick the short offcutter there, made room and tried to clear the in-field on the off side, just about managed to do it, a couple more to the score
shortish outside off, drags it towards deep square leg for a single
bowled it full on the off, driven through the line to long-off for a single
into the crowd again, feeding hi with length deliveries here, clips it off his pads over deep square leg, the crowd couldn't have asked for more
short, pulls it hard towards deep square leg, fielded well in the deep, just a single
cracked towards long-off for a single
had made up his mind there had Watson, the ever so generous Smith gifts him with another length delivery, on middle and leg, and Watson gets under it to dismiss it over wide long-on, terrible bowling
fullish on the off, played towards deep extra cover for a single
bowls it on a length on middle and leg, swipes it on the bounce to deep midwicket for a single
full toss on the off stump, makes room and slaps it towards deep extra cover for one more
another six, in the slot on middle and leg, makes a bit of room and swings it over deep midwicket for a flat six

gets him, finally! Gave it some air this time, tossed up on middle, tried to dispatch it into the stands over deep midwicket, got the top edge and Ramdin, after waiting ages for it to come down, clasped it easily
pushed wide of point for a single
short of a good length on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
slower one bowled full on leg stump, driven in the direction of wide long-on for a couple of runs
full toss on middle, he could have smacked it anywhere but instead played it back straight to the bowler who accepted it gleefully
played down towards third man for a single, thinks of a second but the fielder acts on it quickly
nicely done, took a couple of steps forward, walked across and worked it off his hips wide of short fine for a boundary
driven down the ground towards long-on for a single
sliding it on middle, paddles it down towards fine leg for a couple of runs
comes down the track and taps it down towards long-on for a single
quicker through the air, plays it back to the bowler
three down, cleanly struck but hit flat, came down the track and smacked it hard but straight to Roach at long-off who did well moving to his right and holding on to a sharp one
swept down towards fine leg for a single
flighted outside off, driven towards long-on for a single
short of a length outside off, punched towards deep extra cover for a couple
short of a length, cracked it towards mid-off
shortish on the off, slapped it towards mid-off and raced through for a single, had there been a direct hit, White was a gonner
short of a length outside off, guided wide of short third, who fumbles to allow them a single
short of a good length outside off, guided it straight to short third
short of a good length outside off, chopped it towards short third for a single
gets outside the line to sweep, is struck on the back pad
goes for the sweep again, gets the top edge but it ends up falling short, deep square leg could have done more there, should have charged forward to catch that
punched towards long-off for a single
driven hard towards long-off for a single
short of a length on the off, cracked towards deep point for a single
pitched it up on middle, driven towards midwicket
four down, Miller takes a sharp one at point, short and wide, cut away hard and he hurls himself to his right to snap an excellent catch
too short, ducks under it, too high and is given a wide
leaves it alone like in a Test, short of a good length outside off, shoulders arms to the keeper
gets outside the line and defends it back to the bowler
slower one bowled full on middle, driven hard back to the bowler
short and wide, makes room and cracks it to deep cover for a single, big cheers from his home crowd
shortish on the off, punched towards long-on for a single
makes room and drives it wide of long-off for a couple of runs
bends low to play the sweep, gets an inside edge onto his pads
short of a length on the off, slapped it to long-off for one more
gets outside the line and drives it down the ground to long-on for a single
fires it towards middle and leg, driven to long-off for one more
worked away through square leg, some excellent running fetches them the second
short of a length outside off, tries to force it off the back foot wide of extra cover, gets an inside edge on the bounce to the keeper
short, makes room and cracks it wide of long-off for one more

bowling from well behind the stumps, Sammy in the deep makes a mess of it, length ball outside off, lofts it wide of long-off and Sammy, moving to his right, fails to hold on and allows it to go for a boundary, dropped, poor effort
excellent shot, pitched it up this time and he smashed it hard through long-off and extra cover for a convincing boundary
short of a good length on middle, closes the face to drop it into the leg side for a single
shortish on the off, punched through extra cover for a single
full toss on the off, slapped towards deep midwicket for a single
stumped, Miller bowled it flat outside off, Birt came down the track and tried to push it on the off side, missed and Ramnarine did the rest
flighted on middle, driven through the line to long-on for a single

smashed, ummm not quite, it's actually caught by Pollard running to his right from long-on, flighted on middle and leg, White got under it and tried to launch him over deep midwicket, hit it extremely high, didn't get the desired distance and found the fielder
full on middle, played towards mid-on for a single
flat, shortish outside off, defended into the leg side and he sneaks in a quick single
short of a length on middle, dropped into the leg side for a single
slower one bowled short outside off, guided wide of point for a single
short of a good length outside off and cuts away, leaves it alone to the keeper
edged, cut away, he played it down with soft hands, landed short of the diving keeper who fumbled to allow them a single
tapped it into the off side to steal a single
bowls it on a good length outside off, tried to swing it over midwicket, couldn't get his bat to it
short of a good length outside off, slapped it wide of short cover, sneaks a single and they get another one in overthrows
pitched it up on middle, smacked it over the bowler's head, looked like a certain boundary but for Pollard, who dived full length to his left to keep them down to three
short of a length on middle, pulled away towards deep midwicket for a single
full and wide, tries to reach for it but misses, he's overstepped though and conceded a freehit
gets only a couple, full toss outside off, makes room and chips it over extra cover for a couple
wide, full toss, slipped out of his hand there, another extra ball and run
smashed this time and Pollard has no chance, full toss and he drills it back down the ground to beat long-off and long-on to the ropes
beautifully struck  but equally well fielded, short and wide, cuts it hard wide of point and Morton dived to his left to pull it back in
...and gets a wicket, short outside off, Johnson tries to slap it over the off-side field, doesn't get hold of it, Sammy runs back to hold on to a well-judged catch
full outside off, driven through to long-off for a couple
played down towards long-on for a single
all along the ground towards long-on for a single
nicely timed, full toss outside off, makes room and drives it elegantly to beat deep cover to the ropes, raced off the bat
a terrible delivery, short, this time on middle, and he gives it the appropriate treatment, sending it into the stands over deep midwicket
full outside off, steered to point for a single
Haddin continues to punish, picked it off a length and swung it over wide long-on for another six
played into the off side for a single
short on middle, goes for the pull, gets a top edge but it lands safely behind mid-on, a couple more to the score

what drama, Wavell Hinds lost it in the lights, short on middle and he went for the hook, got a top edge and Hinds, waiting at fine leg, had no clue where it went, by the time he finally saw it, it had gone past the ropes, four more
caught-behind, off the reverse paddle, full outside off, tries to play it towards third man, gets a faint touch and Ramdin makes no mistake
